[Contents]
      4. Extension Modules
        4.5. Module Support Functions

4.5.180. besHandleGetHandle(X,Y)

[<<<] [>>>]

This macro calls handle_GetHandle. The memory segment used by the macro is the default.

Example: 

  void *H;
  int i;
    ....
  i = besHandleGetPointer(H,pointer);
[<<<] [>>>]
